trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Gladwin
There were no other sightings in Gladwin on or around February 2nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsLetting the dog out, seen bright object in the western sky, thinking it was a star, but didn't hear of one being in the sky that night, thinking it could be Venus, but don't know for sure........it's either gone now, or if it was a Star, it clouded over when I went back to look....
